name: Deep Learning Techniques for Visual Question Answering
tagline: Project work done for CS446 - Machine Learning course at UIUC for Fall 2015.
body:
# Deep Learning Techniques for Image Based Question Answering

Machine Learning Project for CS446

The aim of this project is to propose accurate answers for natural language questions based on images. This project was done in collaboration with [Vishaal Mohan](https://github.com/codefetish) and [Pramod Srinivasan](https://github.com/domarps)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
